arts.ttl: Middlesbrough make Birmingham decision on Rob Edwards amid Wolves speculation
arts.sum: Rob Edwards has been identified as Wolves’ priority target to replace Vitor Pereira at Wolves, and sources close to Molineux News have provided an update on the story from Middlesbrough . With both Wolves and Middlesbrough in action on Saturday, many expected a breaking story on Friday evening regarding the future of Edwards .

arts.ttl: Rob Edwards to Miss Middlesbrough vs Birmingham, Likely to Join Wolves
arts.sum: Middlesbrough have decided to remove Rob Edwards from the dugout for today’s Championship clash.

arts.ttl: Ducksch starts: Birmingham City team news and predicted XI to face Middlesbrough
arts.sum: The latest Birmingham City team news and predicted XI as Chris Davies's side gear up to face Middlesbrough. The post Ducksch starts: Birmingham City team news and predicted XI to face Middlesbrough appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
